title: BTS’s Jimin shows off new piercing and fans can’t get enough
text:
It’s all too pure (Pictures: Jimin/vlive)

BTS member Jimin has got a new piercing and he wants the world to know about it – and rightly so.

The singer, who already has several piercings in his ears, was participating in Naver’s V Live chat on Sunday when he got communicating with BTS’s vast Army fandom.

As he chatted topics in real-time with his followers, he revealed his fresh piercing.

‘Remember last week when I said, “Should I get my ear pierced?”’ he said early on, as the artist – who recently celebrated his birthday – pointed to a fresh piercing in his ear.

Seems he did exactly what he was hinting at, as he added: ‘So I went and got a cute new piercing here.’

Going further to explain why he decided to make the leap and pierce his ear, the star revealed he had a short break in his rather busy schedule. While some might sleep in, there is no rest for Jimin who grabbed the day with both hands.

He’s loving his new piercing (Picture: Jimin/vlive)

He showed off the new addition (Picture: Jimin/vlive)

‘There was a day when my schedule ended early, so when I was in the car with our manager, I asked him, “Hyung, should I get my ear pierced?” and he said, “Let’s go.” So we went right away, and I got another piercing,’ he said of the brilliantly spontaneous move.

As he proudly showed off his fresh ear bling, Jimin continued: ‘Now my right ear and left ear are symmetrical!’

Army went wild for Jimin’s piercing, praising him for doing what he wanted.

The band recently returned from a break (Picture: Getty Images for The Recording Academy)

‘Jimin got a new piercing for himself coz he wanted it, he’s doing what he wants, wearing what he wants and he’s happy,’ one gleefully wrote on Twitter. ‘I LOVE HIM SO MUCH.’

Another chimed in as they echoed the same sentiments: ‘Y’all saw how jimin wanted another piercing and he got it? we love a guy that do whatever he wants.’

Shouting happiness from the rooftops, a third wrote: ‘First Jungkook getting tattoos and now Jimin bragging about his new piercing… they’re doing whatever tf they want and it’s a blessing.’

It comes after BTS worked on a collaboration with Lauv.

Big Hit Entertainment tweeted a teaser image of the single Make It Right featuring the I Like Me Better singer last week. The announcement came after Lauv, 25, tweeted a picture of himself and BTS on 16 October, along with the caption: ‘Did I finally #makeitright?’

Yes, yes you did, Lauv.

Make It Right was originally released back in April of this year as part of the boys’ Map of the Soul: Persona extended play. It deservedly entered Billboard’s Hot 100 chart at #95 and Ed Sheeran even helped compose the track.

BTS have recently bounced back hard after returning from their extended period of rest and relaxation and this single will be the group’s fifth collaboration this year alone, following their hit songs with Zara Larsson, Charli XCX, Juice WRLD, and the UK Top 20 single Boy With Luv featuring the one and only Halsey.
